title: Sunny, quiet, spacious w/ washer/dryer @ 715 Haight/Pierce
posting_body: A slice of country in the center of the Lower Haight.
Quiet, south-facing. garden-view remodel with 9-foot ceilings on third floor of 7-unit, four-story secure (security cam-monitored) building that is rent controlled.
Brand new washer/dryer, brand new paint and wall-to-wall carpet.
New stove and refrigerator in remodeled kitchen.
Your own forced-air gas heating system serves every room, including bath.
Usable floor space is approximately 580 square feet.
Great apartment for cyclists, commuter or otherwise.
Tradesman's access to free, sheltered bicycle racks on ground level, secure enough for everyday-type bikes.
Convenient outdoor access from racks to apartments.
Easy to view on short notice.
Call or e-mail Douglas Montgomery for appointment.
Muni and official ("Wiggle") bicycle lane at your door.
Cyclists will enjoy easy access to GG Bridge and Marin County.

This unit is a rental unit subject to the San Francisco Rent Ordinance, which limits evictions without just cause, and which states that any waiver by a tenant of their rights under the Rent Ordinance is void as contrary to public policy.
